target_allocation: Money Market 25%, Fixed Income 15%, Equities 15%, Alternative Investments 45%
allocation_gaps: 100% overallocated in Fixed Income, missing 25% Money Market, 15% Fixed Income, Equities, and 45% Alternative Investments.
Agent_Recommends: The client should reduce the Fixed Income allocation significantly and redistribute the amount into Alternative Investments (45%), Money Market assets (25%), Fixed Income (15%), and Equities (15%). This ensures alignment with R4 risk tolerance and enhances portfolio diversification.
